content: @maintainers This fixes a timeout that failed at least two bors batches (e.g. the two batches PR #16834 was in).
Junyan Xu has marked this topic as resolved.
Sebastien Gouezel has marked this topic as unresolved.

This PR was not merged because another timeout showed up later on. I have just fixed it, in the same PR to make sure that both fixes will be merged together. It would need a bors r+ p=37 to make sure it lands before all the PRs that are waiting in the bors queue (and there are a lot of them since all bors runs have been failing consistently recently).
My guess is that these additional timeouts (and the increase in compile time) may come from #16725.
(Don't trust the red cross which comes from bors, the PR builds correctly).
Thanks! Glad to see it merged successfully.
Junyan Xu has marked this topic as resolved.
